function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of influenza A H1N1 and human adenovirus","Impact":"Risk of widespread infection and illness if not detected and contained","Mitigation":"Regular testing and surveillance, isolation of infected individuals, vaccination programs","Technologies":"Raman scattering-based lateral flow immunoassay, SERS-based LFIA strips, EC biosensors","People":"General public, healthcare workers, laboratory staff","Owner":"Health organizations, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Potential spread of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Risk of widespread COVID-19 transmission and illness if not detected and contained","Mitigation":"Regular testing and surveillance, isolation of infected individuals, vaccination programs","Technologies":"FET biosensors, graphene-based transistors, viral strain detection systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers, laboratory staff","Owner":"Health organizations, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Limited understanding of biosensor terminology among environmental audience","Impact":"Misinterpretation of biosensor data and results","Mitigation":"Educational outreach, clear communication of terminology, training programs","Technologies":"Educational materials, communication tools, training programs","People":"Researchers, environmental professionals, general public","Owner":"Research institutions, educational institutions"}]}
